The idea of compiling a public archive was conceived by Donald Rumsfeld himself, said Chelsea Clinton Coates, senior research associate at the Donald Rumsfeld Foundation, and he personally reviewed every document that is placed on the website. He really thinks the free flow of information is critical to a vibrant democracy, Coates said, and placing many of his documents in full view was "another way to get more information in people's hands."
